page.para: I want to go out and play. But my friends do not like rain.
I love the rain. The rain gives us wa/ter.
Wa/ter is good. I wash with wa/ter.
I drink wa/ter. And I play with it.
The rain helps trees and plants to grow. I love the rain!
The rain helps maize and veg/e/ta/bles to grow. The rain is good!
The rain gives us food. Thank you, rain!
So I go out to play in the rain, all by my/self. I love the rain!
Now I have lots of wa/ter in my hair, but I am hap/py. Thank you, Mum.
